#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cassert>
#include<bitset>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>
#include<cmath>
#include<list>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include <functional>
#include <bitset>

using namespace std;
 
int reverse(int x)
{
	int z=0;
	while(x>0)
	{
	z=z*10+x%10;
	x/=10;
	}
	return z;
}
int main()
{
int t,n,i;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=n;i!=reverse(i);i++);
printf("%d\n",i);
}
return 0;
}
